titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Bob Berenson Papers, 1950-2004 and undated RL.11101
titlestmt.author: Richard Collier

publicationstmt.publisher: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2016-02-26 10:38:00 -0500.

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.unittitle: Bob Berenson Papers, 1950-2004 and undated
did.abstract: Advertising executive with Grey Advertising, Inc.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged into three series: Manila File; Office Files; and Audiovisual Materials.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: BA/BA in journalism and marketing from Syracuse University; MS from Medill School of Journalism, Northwestern University. Began 1964 as Assistant Account Executive at Grey Advertising. Career at Grey: Executive Vice President 1977; President, Grey/NY 1993; Chairman/General Manager Grey Global Group 1999; retired 2005.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: However, original audiovisual materials are closed to research until use copies can be produced.
Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Bob Berenson Papers were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift in 2005.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Bob Berenson Papers, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessions described in this collection guide: 2005-0011

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related materials may be found in the following Hartman Center collections: Caroline Bien Papers; Alvin Achenbaum Papers; J. Walter Thompson Company Advertising Vertical Files.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection spans 1950-2004 and includes speeches, newsletters and other publications; research and strategy reports, audiovisual materials and other materials documenting administration and management of the Grey agency. The collection also touches on activities of other WPP subsidiary agencies. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.
